拫字的基本解释

拫
hén
牵引。
排挤；排斥：拫抑。排拫。

拫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hén］
［《廣韻》户恩切，平痕，匣。］
(1)排挤；排斥。
(2)惩办。

拫字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　拫； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页427第18
【唐韻】戸恩切【集韻】【韻會】胡恩切，?音痕。急引也。【博雅】拫攎，引也。【增韻】吳楚俗謂牽引前郤爲拫挌。【朱子·語類】漢書引繩排拫不附已者，今人誤讀拫爲根。拫挌猶云抵拒擔閣也，引繩排拫，如以繩扞拒然。　又排擠也。【唐書·裴度傳】爲姦憸拫抑。又【崔威傳】裴度自表求覲，李逢吉悉力拫郤之。　又【集韻】下懇切，音很。又胡艮切，音恨。義?同。　【集韻】或作艮。又作掀。【韻會】通作根。

拫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
拫字的起名意思

暂无。

拫
Basic explanation of words
拫
hén
Traction.
Squeeze out; repel: suppress. Line up.
拫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hén］
["Guangyun" Hu Enqie, flat mark, box. ]
(1) Exclusion; exclusion.
(2) Punishment.
拫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　拫; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 427 18
[Tang Yun] Dong Enqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Hu Enqie,? Yin mark. Urgently cited also. 【Bo Ya】pinch, cite. [Added rhyme] Wu Chu said that it is 拫挌 before traction. [Zhuzi·genre] The root of the misreading of the Chinese book that is not attached to the row of ropes is the root of today's misreading.拫挌 still cloud resists Dange, the ropes are arranged in a row, as if they are defended by ropes.　Should be squeezed again. 【Tang Shu · Pei Du Chuan】It's for rape and restraint. [Cui Wei Biography] Pei Du begs himself, but Li Fengji tries his best to stop him.　[Jiyun] Sincerely, the sound is very loud. Hu Gen cut again, with hatred. Righteous? Same.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo Gen. Also made a lift. 【Rhyme Club】Through the roots.
